data.title: HP 15, 13th Gen Intel Core i3-1315U, 8GB DDR4, 512GB SSD, (Win 11, Office 21, Grey, 1.59kg), Anti-Glare, Micro-Edge,15.6-inch(39.6cm), FHD Laptop, Intel UHD Graphics, 1080p FHD Camera, fd0006TU

description.info: Experience versatile computing with 8 threads and 10MB L3 cache, delivering a perfect blend of performance and power for demanding tasks.
Immerse yourself in a seamless visual experience with Intel UHD graphics, ensuring speedy and efficient performance for various applications.
Run multiple programs effortlessly with 8GB DDR4 RAM, while the high-speed 512GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD helps you boot up in seconds, enhancing daily usability.
Experience vibrant visuals on the 15.6-inch FHD, micro-edge display. The anti-glare panel and 250-nit brightness combine for a captivating viewing experience.
Swiftly power up from 0% to 50% in just 45 minutes with HP Fast Charge. The 3-cell, 41Wh battery ensures worry-free usage for up to 7 hours and 45 minutes.

data.title: Foxin 21.5 Inch Full HD LED Monitor (1920 x 1080) Elite Series | IPS Panel | 100Hz Refresh Rate | True Pixel | Anti-Glare & Flicker-Free | Frameless | 16.7 Million Colors | 3 Years Warranty

description.info: Sleek design with a 22 inch display, providing a Full HD 1080p resolution on a Flat Screen IPS Panel for vibrant visuals.
Experience 1ms response time and 100Hz refresh rate, perfect for a monitor gaming setup, minimizing lag and motion blur.
HDMI Port and VGA Port included, compatible with PCs, notebooks, gaming consoles, and more—plus, the HDMI cable is included!
Anti-glare and flicker-free technology with True Pixel delivers 16.7 million colors, while reducing eye strain for longer sessions.
Wall mount option and -5°/5° tilt, making this the ideal monitor for PC or any 22 inch monitor setup.
